entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries or rain showers ending this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. POP 30%
